### b.
Output the respective count of females and males aboard the Titanic. Plot the frequency of females and males.  Be sure to give an accurate title and label the axes.

```{r echo=TRUE}
numMales <- length(which(data$Sex == "male"))
numFemales <- length(which(data$Sex == "female"))

sprintf("The number of males are %i",numMales)
sprintf("The number of females are %i",numFemales)
